ToolTipText.title: Initialize
ToolTipText.tip: Initialize the system by loading an electron into the launcher

ToolTipText.title: Launch
ToolTipText.tip: Launch the electron towards the proton inside the detector

ToolTipText.title: Teleport
ToolTipText.tip: Teleport to a new vantage point (unlocked after one electron / proton collision cycle)

ToolTipText.title: Q2Slider
ToolTipText.tip: Adjust momentum transfer (QÂ²), which allows us to increase "resolution" inside the proton

ToolTipText.title: FollowToggle
ToolTipText.tip: Follow the particles on their paths or watch from a set position

ToolTipText.title: TextToggle
ToolTipText.tip: Show the labels on particles as well as these toolstips

ToolTipText.title: MouseLook
ToolTipText.tip: Look around with the mouse (off by default when menu is open)

ToolTipText.title: FlightMode
ToolTipText.tip: Flight mode (unlocked after one collision cycle) WASD = forward, backward, spin left, spin right QE = strafe left, strafe right ZX = down, up

ToolTipText.title: PauseAtKeyEvents
ToolTipText.tip: Pause the simulation at key events (e.g. when a photon hits the proton)
